screen_desc: The screenshot shows a smartphone home screen with a pink gradient background. At the top, it displays the date as Monday, August 22, and the weather as cloudy with a temperature of 61°F. There are two app icons: "Maps" on the left and "Google Chrome" on the right. Below these icons, there is a Google search bar. The screen also includes a notification bar at the top and the home button at the bottom.
action_think: The user requested to uninstall DoorDash - Food Delivery. To achieve this, I need to navigate to the app drawer and locate the DoorDash app. Once found, I will uninstall it.

action_result: By scrolling up, I have moved to the app drawer where you can find all the apps installed on your device. This is the necessary step to locate and uninstall the "DoorDash - Food Delivery" app as requested by the user.
